page.title: 16Penygawsi Estate Survey 1
page.content:
The children of Penygawsi Primary school conducted a door to door survey of the estate around the school. The following facts were discovered:- { { 69%}have lived here 1-9 years {7% }" " " 16-22 "{ { { 34%}moved here from 1-6 miles away { 31% } " " " 10-12 " "
These facts help to show that the estate is a "young" one (the majority of houses have not been built long) It is popular because people with local knowledge have chosen to live here. The people who have moved here from 10-12 miles away have come from the Cardiff area or the Valleys.The Cardiff people may have moved to avoid the high cost of housing whereas the Valley people may have come for jobs.
